For personal use only. Best suited for older phones (under Android 12); safest on a second phone with a second number. Automates M-Pesa USSD (*334#) for send money, paybill, till, and withdraw. Requires Accessibility and your M-Pesa PIN. Works offline.

Open source: https://github.com/davidamunga/pesamirror
Author: David Amunga — https://davidamunga.com

Use at your own risk. Not affiliated with Safaricom.
Automate M-Pesa USSD (*334#) for Send Money, Paybill, Till, and Withdraw. Fill the form, tap Run, and the app guides the USSD flow for you. Works fully offline—no data is sent to any server.
You must enable PesaMirror in Accessibility settings so it can read the USSD menu and enter your choices. Your PIN is stored securely on device only.
Enter your M-Pesa PIN in the app before running. Never share it. The app works fully offline—no data is sent to any server.

Strictly for personal use only. Works fully offline. Best suited for older phones (under Android 12). Safest if used on a second phone with a second number you don’t use for daily banking. The app can perform real transactions—any loss or misuse is your responsibility. Not affiliated with Safaricom.
PesaMirror is open source on GitHub. Author: David Amunga — davidamunga.com. Use and modify at your own risk.
Choose Send Money, Paybill, Till, or Withdraw. The form fields change based on your selection.
Enter your M-Pesa PIN here. It is stored securely on this device only.
Tap to start *334# and the app will automate the steps. Ensure Accessibility is enabled first.
